original: 馮翊東縣人，曹魏官員，李豐之子。因夏侯玄、李豐密謀推翻司馬師，李韜亦參與其中，多次幫李豐聯絡黨徒。後事跡敗露，李氏被夷三族。
text: Feng Yidong County, Cao Wei official, son of Li Feng. Because Xia Houxuan and Li Feng conspired to overthrow Sima Shi, Li Tao also participated in the process and helped Li Feng to contact his party followers many times. After the deeds were revealed, the Li family was taken by the Yi tribe.
